alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Drew; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 4:24PM CDT until July 09 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... North central Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... Southwestern Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 423 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Feenyville, or near Star City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Star City... Gould... Nebo... Feenyville... Plantersville... Cane Creek State Park... Glendale in Lincoln County... Calhoun... Cornerville... Rowell... Palmyra... Rose Hill... Crigler... Fresno... Calmer... Garnett... Avery... Yorktown... Relfs Bluff... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
